title: Simulado AWS Associate Solutions Architect - Prova 1

questions.question: What is the AWS Well-Architected Framework?
options: A certification program for AWS architects
A set of architectural best practices for building and operating reliable, secure, efficient, and cost-effective systems in the AWS Cloud
An AWS service that automatically designs and deploys architectures for your applications
A machine learning service provided by AWS for predictive analysis

questions.question: Which AWS service would you use to distribute incoming application traffic across multiple EC2 instances?
What is the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) service?
options: A service for monitoring and analyzing AWS resource utilization
A service for creating and managing AWS virtual private networks
A service that provides secure and controlled access to AWS resources
A service for managing and scaling containerized applications
